newsitem.title: USA: Lucent unit to resell Raptor products.
newsitem.headline: Lucent unit to resell Raptor products.

text.p: Raptor Systems Inc on Monday said that Lucent Technologies Inc's Lucent NetCare Services business will resell Raptor's entire line of network security software.
Financial details of the deal were not disclosed.
The products to be resold include Raptor's Eagle System firewalls, remote encryption, and mobile secure remote access products.

NetCare, which provides network consulting, integration, management and maintenance services, will use Raptor's products to design and implement secure multimedia networks for mid- to large-sized businesses, Raptor said.
